title: Award Championship Rings
description: After winning a championship, a team needs to design and order championship rings for all players and staff.

tasks.description: Work with a jewelry company to design the championship ring.
tasks.expected_outcome: A final design for the ring is approved.

tasks.description: Get the ring size for every eligible player and staff member.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all the necessary ring sizes.

tasks.description: Place the order for the rings with the jewelry company.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully places the bulk order for the rings.
